name: sailor
text: be careful

name: shogun
text:
Thank you, I will.

I haven't left the house on a Friday since 2004, just in case. Which explains why I'm here, at 11:30 on a Friday, continuing on through the archive.

name: scion
text: Help, yes, which Friday is Judas Priest Friday? on which Friday should I be special careful of ordering a Dominos?

name: greyfield
text:
Every Friday is a Judas Priest Friday. Or not. But you'll never know... until it's too late.

Beware...

name: fancyrat
text: Always be careful of ordering Domino's.

name: lexsenthur
text: I should cut a pizza like this today and see what happe

name: anzio
text: I'll tell you what will happen, someone will want the fat ass pieces and everyone will fight over it and then someone will eat the middle and it'll just be a mess.

name: dusty
text: I get the feeling you speak from experience.

name: anzio
text: Perhaps.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Come on. This one's just fun.

name: evilbobikus
text: When I worked at a Domino's, I cut a pizza like this for a delivery on a Friday the 13th.  The pizza actually ended up going to a heavily religious family, who sent a priest over to the Domino's for some sort of exorcism.

name: jonmw
text:
That is wonderful.
Did you find out that it was you, and if so, did you keep your job?

name: evilbobikus
text: They did, but apparently the first exorcist visit only merits a warning.

name: invidious
text: That is even more wonderful.

name: tekende
text: If you had stopped with the first sentence, I probably would have believed you. But the second sentence was too absurd.

name: hexjumper
text: It's not just getting a pair of knives shoved into your ears - it's the fact that you burst into flame directly afterwards that makes it Judas Priest Friday. The three-story fall is just icing on the cake.

name: drycup
text: Yes, but it is not a cake that ladies be mashin with their bottoms.

name: kledermans
text: But if it were, that would definitely make up for everything in Ray's book.

name: cheezeburger
text: This is exactly what should happen to someone who orders pizza from Domino's more than once.  Actually, it would have been more proper for a player to die of shame, but short of that, this is the correct death.  Good on Judas Priest.

name: billyamericana
text: I GET THE PENTAGON SLICE!

name: zem
text: it's maybe as big as the arms of the star, and a lot smaller than the parts outside the star

name: catachresis
text: I may be wrong here, but I think geometry (which is extremely awesome) says that the parts outside the star are bigger than the arms of the star. The pentagon slice is the biggest piece.

name: stevegt500
text: A comment left by stevegt500 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pityparty, kylank, Darthemed)

name: chaesar
text: A comment left by chaesar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by prolefeed5, kylank, twohundredninety, StagnantDisplay, ih8jonmayr, cathaoir, eRiUukFJk)

name: chaesar
text:
Agh lame me, why can't I read sentences.

The pieces outside look bigger, but the pentagon has no crust, so its all about what you look for in pizza.

name: someone3
text: also the center of a pentagram is to focus point, thus he would be basically be eating Ray's soul.

name: hellofyellin
text: This discussion is what the internets are for.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Scroll wheels were invented because these conversations happen on the internets.

name: zeroasalimit
text: The pentagon has no crust? Damn politicians and their crust-cutting ways, that's no way to enjoy pizza!

name: dropkickpikachu
text: But it is a way to enjoy a PB&J sandwich if you are a child of small stature.

name: the_stoned_one
text: man ive been meaning to learn a bit of geometry

name: laserblade
text: I love you, man.  I love you because you are stoned.

name: tim_simmons
text: man, no crust, no way

name: nurdbot
text: And so, since this comic, I have always wished people a awesome Judas Priest Friday. Little known fact: Somebody has made a 3D animated version on YouTube. Look it up.

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
it would seem that you are in fact correct . thanks for the heads up!

however, despite the sincere homage, since the video lacks any discernable 'splut's i only give it a 3/5.

name: laserblade
text: And the voice of Ray is God-awful.

name: reverendsam
text: i worry every friday :(

name: ttagxamm
text:
alt-text: I Stood By For Exciter in '89
/alt-text

I saw Megadeth, Anthrax & Slayer in '91, at Pine Knob Amphitheatre. FWIW.

name: twotonturkey
text: I was at that show at Pine Knob too!  I had to lie to my mother, she thought I was at a friend's house spending the night.

name: stuart
text:
But you were at a friend's house...

that friend's name was SATAN

name: hellofyellin
text: This is what Ray gets for ordering a pizza from Domino's.  It is silly to eat at Domino's Ray.  It is very bad!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Domino's makes terrible pizza because they are terrible people.

name: someone3
text: that is why i always order from dominion pizza.

name: never_die
text: i have to cut a pizza like that sometime...but first, to make a pizza!

name: junko
text: Pretty sure this is the first "Friday" strip.

name: pohlhoud
text: Ray is Dead.

name: rowboat
text: Long live Ray.

name: honesttom
text: I saw that animated version. It had hella poor comic timing.

name: talix18
text: And that is so not Ray's voice.

name: jordstar
text:
I emailed the link to that video to Onstad and this is what he had to say about it:

Yeah, the guy emailed me when he posted it up there. Pretty cool, isn%u2019t it. I definitely wouldn%u2019t have voiced Ray as a white animation student, though.


Best,

/C

name: riazm
text: To be fair, I think Ray's voice is one of the hardest to pin down.

name: jordstar
text:
We may have to wait until the baby is college age and Chris decides Achewood: The Animated Series would be a good way to pay for that.

THEN we'll see who he taps for voice actors!

name: rowboat
text: I dread that day. As tempting as it may seem, I'm very skeptical about comics becoming animated. My trepidation comes from the results of that happening to Maakies. A brilliant series of comics turned into a thoroughly underwhelming series of animated shorts. The voice acting is the scariest part. It's just way too easy to fuck up.

name: jordstar
text: I liked what I saw of the Maakies shorts, and was aware of, but never really got into, the comics. But I understand what you mean, especially with voice acting. Sometimes it seems like the entirety of Modern American Cartoondom has about three total professional voice actors. Who all suck very much.

name: hyetal
text:
Any comic turned into a cartoon will not have the voices you imagined. That is something you will have to prepare for.

I would also like to invite those who complained about the video's comic timing or voice acting to make a better one.

I liked it.

name: deusoma
text: I was pretty much goona write exactly that, but since you already went ahead and did it, I'll just agree with you.

name: deusoma
text: Goona. Jesus.

name: mremaknu
text:
If your typo is still fun to say, it is slightly less appalling to have typo'd.

But it is still appalling. You should be ashamed.

name: pepperhittherim
text: I want to get a job at a pizza place just so I can do this to people's pizzas

name: epicurus
text: I think it would be cool if pizzas came that way sometimes.

name: dasilodavi
text: I don't get it.

name: lost_buoy
text: Fall to your knees and repent, if you please (blistering KK Downing solo).

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Operation HOT S.A.U.C.E.
Lyle: I ain't gonna speak at no AVN awards
Molly: Who's Hot Stuff? I am.

-Onstad-
Full English Breakfast
Thank you everybody

name: achilleselbow
text: Man Onstad must be hella old.

name: possums
text:
GUYS. OH MY GOD.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbUdU8Q0nAo

WHAT.

name: nighend
text: Note that the balcony has a sliding door, that is in fact closed before Ray jumps out of it. Being a Judas Priest Friday, it probably opened by itself to facilitate Ray's fall.

name: unsentletter
text:
I doesn't make sense.

It totally makes sense.

I love it.

name: jhunter
text: the fear comes from the fact that if Ray tried to roll over and quell the flames, the knives would be driven into his brain

name: misplacedwilder
text: Do I have to say something intelligent, or can I just say that I had to sign-up and login just so I could give this one a 5 vote?

name: housewife
text: this is the strip I use to convince people that achewood is better than most other things

name: carlyle
text:
The outside view of the house before Ray falls off the balcony is... platinum?

Also, the guy he ordered the pizza with must be freaking out something awful.

name: aperson
text: Heard about Judas Priest Thursday? Just... just don't order chinese...

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Fortune Cookie Say: Splut-Splut

name: philophobe
text: FALL TO YOUR KNEES AND REPENT, IF YOU PLEASE [RAYMOND Q. SMUCKLES]!

name: berami
text:
I love this one so much, I don't know why I hadn't 5ed it before, but now it seems can't.
I used to know a bartender who would put a little pentagram on my Guiness, and it was awesome. Never lead to me being stabbed in the ears, spontaniously catching fire, and falling off a balcony, though.
